pages.text: There are two dock blogs: barge and tug. The tug block must always be present for the barge docks to work. The top texture of the tug dock must be aligned with the barge docks. The barge docks must form a straight line from the tug dock, without gaps. The dock line be next to a 1 block wide canal, wider canals can prevent the vessels from docking properly.

pages.title: Tug Dock
pages.text: The tug dock can only insert into the tug (orange/output mode), place a hopper on top of the dock to extract. Shift right-click the tug dock to flip the dock direction See the next page for barge dock >>>

pages.title: Barge Dock
pages.text: The barge docks can both insert (orange/output mode) and extract (blue/input) mode into/from the barges, shift-right click to switch the mode. Place a hopper below the waterblock next to the barge dock to extract
